DarkDaysAhead.name: Arcana and Magic Items
DarkDaysAhead.description: Arcana and Magic Items mod for Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead

DarkDaysAhead.name: Cataclysm: Second Chance
DarkDaysAhead.description: An expansion for Cataclysm:DDA that intends to add a little of everything

DarkDaysAhead.name: Fallout New England
DarkDaysAhead.description: A mod that adds fallout content to CDDA

DarkDaysAhead.name: Tame Bugs
DarkDaysAhead.description: A mod for Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead. Contains the ability to tame various insects.

DarkDaysAhead.name: Fallout: New England Remastered
DarkDaysAhead.description: A remastering of my original Fallout mod for C:DDA. Should work with newest Bright Nights release for as long as I update and maintain it.

TheLastGeneration.name: Mind Over Matter
TheLastGeneration.description: Port of MoM from CDDA to CTLG. Adds nine separate psionic power paths to Cataclysm including Biokinesis, Clairsentience, Electrokinesis, Photokinesis, Pyrokinesis, Telekinesis, Telepathy, Teleportation, and Vitakinesis.

TheLastGeneration.name: Bionics Expanded
TheLastGeneration.description: Expanded bionics system for Cataclysm: The Last Generation.

TheLastGeneration.name: Mythical Martial Arts
TheLastGeneration.description: Mythical martial arts mod ported to Cataclysm: The Last Generation.

BrightNights.name: Cataclysm: Second Chance
BrightNights.description: A mod for Cataclysm: Bright Nights which adds my own custom content to it

BrightNights.name: Better Holsters
BrightNights.description: A mod for Cataclysm: Bright Nights that improves the holster experience

BrightNights.name: Fallout: New England Remastered
BrightNights.description: A remastering of my original Fallout mod for C:DDA. Should work with newest Bright Nights release for as long as I update and maintain it.

BrightNights.name: Really Dark Skies
BrightNights.description: Really Dark Skies. The community supported mod that enhances the Bright Nights experience by adding an inscrutable alien-humanoid paramilitary expeditionary force to your typical survival scenario.

BrightNights.name: The Arcology Mod
BrightNights.description: The mod that adds Arcology-type buildings, very large, self-contained buildings with a Cyberpunk aesthetic to Bright Nights.
